title: How to count the occurrence of the searched word from indexed document.
description:
Hi All,

I am new to Lucene, Can anyone help me to find solution for counting the number of occurrence of searched word in indexed document.

Thanks

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise usage issues like this on the Solr user's list, see: http://lucene.apache.org/solr/resources.html, the "mailing lists" section. We try to reserve the JIRAs for development rather than usage questions.

If it's determined through discussion there that changes to the code are necessary, we can re-open this issue or create a new one.
